hero.tagline: I create solutions with the user in mind.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: A bit about my journey and favorite technologies.
about.paragraph1: I started my journey in programming and technology years ago and have since worked on various projects, from support and operations to high-availability systems and SaaS products.
about.paragraph2: Currently, I work as CTO and Full-Stack developer, building accessible and scalable solutions. I love solving complex problems and leading projects end-to-end.

projects.subtitle: Some of the work I've developed recently.

cta.title: Interested in collaborating?
cta.subtitle: I'm always open to discussing product development and new technology opportunities.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: My inbox is always open. Whether you have a question, a project opportunity, or just want to say hi, I'll do my best to get back to you!
